snippet: Through Thursday's games, the Charlotte Bobcats owned the league's worst record, at 3-22. But that only begins to describe how bad Charlotte has been.
abstract: Through Thursday's games, the Charlotte Bobcats owned the league's worst record, at 3-22. But that only begins to describe how bad Charlotte has been.
lead_paragraph: Michael Jordan may be the greatest basketball player of all time, a renowned competitor who led the Chicago Bulls to six N.B.A. titles and retired with a league-record career scoring average of 30.1 points per game.
